member.name: M:Car.API.Controllers.ChallengeController.Login(Car.Core.Models.LoginDTO)
member.summary: This method returns token as {addressToken: "token"}. You can test by {"userName":"test-user", "password":"test1234"}

member.name: M:Car.API.Controllers.ChallengeController.GetCars
member.summary: Gets the list of all car details in database. It needs token in header as {"Authorization": "Bearer [token]"}
member.returns: Returns list of all car details.

member.name: M:Car.API.Controllers.ChallengeController.AddCar(Car.Core.Models.CarDetailsDTO)
member.summary: Adds a car details in database. It needs token in header as {"Authorization": "Bearer [token]"}
